subject: Mathematics - Geometric Topology
Mathematics - General Topology
Mathematics - Rings and Algebras
Primary 57M27, Secondary 20E18, 20E26, 57M12
creator: Ueki, Jun
title:
The profinite completions of knot groups determine the Alexander
  polynomials
description:
We study several properties of the completed group ring
$\hat{\mathbb{Z}}[[t^{\hat{\mathbb{Z}}}]]$ and the completed Alexander modules
of knots. Then we prove that the profinite completions of knot groups determine
the Alexander polynomials.
